title: Men's Weights
question_text: The statistics below provide a summary of the distribution of weight, in pounds, from a sample of one hundred adult men: Minimum: $138\text{ pounds}$ First Quartile: $153\text{ pounds}$ Median: $171\text{ pounds}$ Third Quartile: $192\text{ pounds}$ Maximum: $213\text{ pounds}$ Which of the following statements is always FALSE?

choices.text: 75 75 of the men in this sample weigh at least 192 pounds 192 pounds .
25 25 of the men in this sample weigh, at most, 153 pounds 153 pounds .
50 50 of the men in this sample can weigh, at most, 171 pounds 171 pounds .
50 50 of the men in this sample can weigh at least 171 pounds 171 pounds .
25 25 of the men in this sample weigh at least 192 pounds 192 pounds .
